about_the_game:
When Jacob, a disheveled war veteran, gets startled by a massive quake and accompanying roar of destruction he fears the worst.
He hurries over to his home and sees it beyond wrecked, someone threw down an entire wall on top of his house!
This is the final straw, he grabs the things closest to him, a Drumstick and a Trashcan Lid, and vows his revenge.

Now Ruthless and Roofless, whoever did this shall know his Wrath!

Gameplay
Wrath of the Roothless is a randomly generated action roguelike, follow Jacob and punch through hordes of enemies, unleashing magical chicken powers along the way. Collect wrath from your slain enemies and improve your ability to brawl. Every level features a chance to earn a favor of the gods, these can further change your gameplay experience.

About Wrath of the Roothless
Wrath of the Roothless is a game about revenge, and dispensing it to monstrous enemies. Raking up crystalized wrath and scoring on the Rock of Remembrance. Currently the game features 1 playable environment type for runs, and 1 boss monster.


No plans are present to further develop the game, other than fixing critical bugs.
